tree.name: Steven Adams
tree.tradeDescription: Rockets got Adams from Grizzlies for Oladipo and 3 second round picks
tree.note: New Zealand center acquired from Memphis Grizzlies

assetsGivenUp.name: Victor Oladipo

assetsGivenUp.name: Kevin Porter Jr.
